Name: Demon Blade VR
About the game: In Demon Blade VR, you wield dual swords inherited from a legendary demon slayer 'Kolipkaza' in a dire moment while an volcanic demon lord 'Ifritus' erupted by mysterious reasons is attempting to immolate our precious world , you as the only descendant left has to stop him. Key Features - Immersive Real-time Combat - Swing dual swords in your play style - Dodge Boss' Attacks - Get soaked by sweat Cautions - Thrilling Actions may cause heart problems in some cases - Need spatial awareness to prevent accidents
